projects.title: My personal website!
projects.description: A website I built to showcase my personal accomplishments and work history, think a live resume. I built this site using React.js, react-bootstrap, react-router, gh-pages in ES6.

projects.title: test multiple project modules
projects.description: this is a test for rendering multiple modules

projects.title: ViralPoll
projects.description: A polling social network for the web that allows users to create and vote on public opinion polls. ViralPoll uses Node.JS, MongoDB, REST APIs, and OAuth2.0 authentication.

projects.title: TutorMe
projects.description: TutorMe is an Android application that provides quick and easy access to an expert in a subject with a real tutor within the vicinity of the user. TutorMe utilizes Java, Firebase API, GeoFire AP, and Google Maps API.
